text: Dophin Song is a children's novel by Lauren St. John. It is the second in the Legend of the Animal Healer series. The other books in the series are The White Giraffe, The Last Leopard, and The Elephant's Tale. Dophin Song was first published on August 1, 2007. It was published nine times from 2008 to 2010. The story is about a girl named Martine. She has the ability to heal animals. She has many adventures because of her that. In this book, she and several of her schoolmates get stuck on island out in the middle of nowhere. They have to learn to get along and survive alone. ==References== Category:English children's books Category:English novels Category:2007 books
title: Dolphin Song
